mapper.select: select A.*, (select B.id as goodsPrice from p_goods B where (A.full - B.price) <= 100 || (A.full - B.price) >= -100 and (B.source = 1 or B.source = 3) LIMIT 1) as goodsId, (select price from p_goods where id = goodsId) as goodsPrice, (select name from p_goods where id = goodsId) as goodsName from p_user_coupon A where A.end_time >= now() and A.user_id = #{user_id} and A.state = 1 order by A.create_time desc;
